DOC.brief_title: High Intensity Interval Training With Strength/Power Exercises VO2Max
DOC.detailed_description: A total 10 visit perform . The subject divide two exercise group : 1 ) control group ( CG ) perform aerobic activity run walk moderate intensity ( 65 % VO2max ) ; 2 ) strength power exercise group ( GFP ) , hold protocol circuit . On first visit subject answer initial questionnaire risk stratification coronary artery disease , perform maximal aerobic exercise test . The subject perform interval protocol strength power exercise high intensity circuit . 20 second stimuli provide 10 second passive recovery , total 4 minute . In last session subject perform initial procedure adopt first visit determine value VO2max training . The control group perform one training session total run time conduct eight session GFP group ( approx . 30 min ) .
DOC.criteria: Strength training practitioner least 6 month 18 / 45 year No injury Use ergogenic resource Hypertension cardiovascular disease Drugs
